overview:
Jennifer Yager began her career at WPP’s Team Detroit ad agency, where she managed digital media strategy and planning for Lincoln Mercury and Ford Customer Service Division. She was then promoted to the agency’s Ford car team and created the online advertising launch plans for the Mustang, Focus, Fusion, and Taurus vehicle lines.

Jennifer continued her career at Universal McCann as Associate Media Director on the Microsoft Internet Explorer media planning team and devised the first mobile and gaming programs for the launch of IE9.

Jennifer then moved onto the start-up BuzzLogic and as Director of Client Services reined in the teams’ processes and reporting services for clients.
